short_summary: Supply and deliver firewood to six campgrounds in Jasper National Park, between May 1st, 2023, and March 31st, 2024, to a value of approximately 500 cords of wood annually.
description: The supply and delivery of firewood to various locations in Jasper National Park, Alberta, as per the specifications contained in the attached documents.
full_summary:
**Notice: Standing Offer for Firewood Supply and Delivery to Jasper National Park**

**Title**: 5P423-220186

**Reference Number**: WS3909066605-Doc3927229939

**Modification Number**: 1

**Solicitation Number**: WS3909066605

**Publication Date**: March 23, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: April 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

## Suppliers' Opportunity

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Parks Canada Agency (PC) invites you to submit a standing offer for the supply and delivery of firewood to six campgrounds, one woodlot, and one day-use area in Jasper National Park, Alberta.

## Terms and Conditions

*   Deliveries will take place between May 1st, 2023, and March 31st, 2024
*   Approximate annual distribution: 500 cords of wood
*   Standing Offer Period: April 1st, 2023, to March 31st, 2024, with an option to extend for up to four additional one-year periods

## Mandatory Requirements

*   The successful supplier must be able to transport and deliver firewood to the specified locations
*   All firewood must conform to the specifications outlined in the Notice

## Evaluation Criteria

*   Bids will be evaluated based on price and the ability to meet the contract requirements

## Trade Agreements

This opportunity is open to suppliers participating in the following trade agreements:

*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Point of Contact

For further information, please contact:

*   Lorraine Jenkinson
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Email: [lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lor
